entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 9:06 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 14. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:06 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023
